channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2984] Shipping/payment cost have to be country specific
item.description:
Today the shipping/payment cost are related to the sales org.
As we have different costs for countries that belongs to the same sales org, we have to change the data model. So the costs should be related to a country instead of a sales org.

This CR has to be implemented at least for the GoLive of the Baltics.
item.summary: Shipping/payment cost have to be country specific

comments.comment: Please include in scope / estimation for ELFA

Call mit Raphi:

Not just the shipping and payment costs will be country specific, but also the movex shipping and payment modes. In order to have variable shipping costs for each country and brand (e.g. proditech), we create a relation between the shipping / payment costs / modes and the cms site,
Done!
Please test

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3292] Tracking Download-Link Compare-View
item.description:
Test-Case: On http://test.a.distrelec.ch/compare (art. '765586' as item) -> click on pdf-Link -> Currently no Webtrekk-request fired (as on product-detail pages). Please refactor (.ch/.it/.at) also for other analogous implementations.

Thx Mark
item.environment:
* OS: W7 SP1
* UA: Chrome 31.0.1650.63 m

comments.comment:
Added name Attribute to <a> Tag in the Compare List. Is now the same Implementation as on Product Detail Page.

Resolved.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3177] IF-00_CheckUser - Error in webservice response
item.description: When the webservice is called with the attached request (IF00CheckUser01_request.xml) an error is returned (IF00CheckUser01_response.xml)

comments.comment: Francesco, please check - I fixed mapping issue.

Hi Maciej
with an existing uset the service works fine.

But when i invoke the service with an unexisting user the service returns an error:

com.sap.engine.interfaces.messaging.api.exception.MessagingException: com.sap.engine.interfaces.messaging.api.exception.MessagingException: com.sap.aii.af.sdk.xi.srt.BubbleException: System Error Received. HTTP Status Code = 200: However System Error received in payload ErrorCode = PARSE_APPLICATION_DATA ErrorCategory = XIProxy Parameter1 = Request Message Parameter2 = CX_ST_DESERIALIZATION_ERROR Parameter3 = /1SAI/TXSF76BA25FBBD35F95023B Line 35 Parameter4 = An error occurred when deserializing in the simple transformation program /1SAI/TXSF76BA25FBBD35F95023B (Data loss occurred when converting NOTEXISTINGUSER Kernel ErrorId: CONVT_DATA_LOSS) XML Bytepos.: 124 XML Path: ns1:CheckUserRequest(1)user(1) Additional text = ErrorStack = Error during XML => ABAP conversion: Request Message; CX_ST_DESERIALIZATION_ERROR in /1SAI/TXSF76BA25FBBD35F95023B Line 35 An error occurred when deserializing in the simple transformation program /1SAI/TXSF76BA25FBBD35F95023B (Data loss occurred when converting NOTEXISTINGUSER Kernel ErrorId: CONVT_DATA_LOSS) XML Bytepos.: 124 XML Path: ns1:CheckUserRequest(1)user(1)
An error occurred when deserializing in the simple transformation program /1SAI/TXSF76BA25FBBD35F95023B

it seems an error on the SAP ERP side.

Do you mean user in request xml?
I mean:

<n0:CheckUserRequest xmlns:n0="http://www.distrelec.com/elfa">
<user>blablabla</user>
<password>wrongpassword</password>
</n0:CheckUserRequest>

Yes
if the user does not exist in SAP then i get the error above.
In that case the user blablabla does not exist and you should get the error.

Ok, problem found. SAP throws uncaught exception because of non-numeric value put for optional parameter (passwordAttemptsLimited).
The question is who should ensure data validity - sender or receiver?

Ok, problem found. SAP throws uncaught exception because of non-numeric value put for optional parameter (passwordAttemptsLimited).
The question is who should ensure data validity - sender or receiver?

Probably we will ensure on the webshop side that the input for the user is validated.
Anyway this kind of validation error shoud be managed also on SAP side and return a specific soap fault in case of wrong data format
Yes, there should be no uncaught exceptions. However, that's task for the ABAP developer.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2659] Import product EAN and add it to the FF export
item.description:
• Import the product EAN into hybris. (hybris attribute ean)
  • Replace the field Master in the FF export with the field EAN
item.summary: Import product EAN and add it to the FF export

comments.comment:
Dean,
can you please align with Cornel for an effort estimation?
As per Raphael and Florian, implementation for launch 1 would be desirable, but isn't mission critical.
Agreed with Florian to implement for CH/IT

Hi Cornel,

can you please make an estimation of the implementation effort. Thank you.
not required for CH/IT according to Florian and David

Estimation: 1.5 PD

Open Question:

  • How is the EAN information provided in the PIM XML file?
Raphael, please see the open question from Cornel

Hi David
Can you help me? How is the attribute called in the PIM export for the EAN information?
It's "ERP_EANCode". However this task is no priority.

Hi Cornel

See info from David.
Feature for v2.0 implemented.
Merged to v1.1

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3796] 8.2 -> Refactoring remaining events
item.description:

-> Service + (compare http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Bohrer-f%C3%BCr-Beton%2C-T3066-04-C-K---T3066%2004/p/serviceplus/90018035 - B2B-Login required):

-> Request higher bulk rates (compare http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Laborkabel-%C3%B8-4-mm-rot-100-cm-Multi-Contact-SML-100cm-red/p/14022002 - B2B-Login required):

  • req-snd: Currently 'req-snd' is transmitted (compare attached screenshot: req-snd.png). Required would be: ch.ons.req-snd.-

Thx Mark

comments.comment:
As discussed yesterday please advise regarding deployment.

Thx Mark

We'll be testable after the first V2.0 deployment to HPQ on May 12th.
Is that ok?

Yes this is ok. Please deploy asap on HP-Q.

Thx Mark

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3626] Payment: Existing CC -> Remove the "Name" line
item.description:
If a payment is placed with an existing credit card, the CC form of DeuCS shows the selected card information.
However, the name of the payer is missing.

-> not correctly stored on the payment info?
-> or not available whatsoever and the display should be changed?
item.summary: Payment: Existing CC -> Remove the "Name" line

comments.comment:
René,
can you please investigate this when you have a gap?

We don't get the Name in the response from EvoPayment.

I think this is the normal way how it works.

Was the implementation in the old shop different?

ok so the changes needed are:

  • on the oder detail page where the user selects the payment method, remove the name line from the credit card alias altogether. The name displayed there is as registered in myAccount and therefor wrong.
  • in the DeuCS iframe, if existing card was selected: remove the name ("Karteninhaber") line
Done. Sent new Template to Evo DeuCS.
Sent another iteration. Waiting for DeuCS.

DeuCS Test Template is online and ok, please review.

Name Line removed from Checkout. Not yet deployed on TEST.
DeuCS: Verified, looks ok.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3307] Multiple currencies support
item.description:
Additional functionality to be implemented:

  • Existing customers:
    The customers (default) currency might change in SAP. During login of the customer, we have to read the (new) attribute in IF-08 and update the customers currency (in B2BUnit). This currency has to be used in the shop. But the webuser must never be able to change the currency and compare prices in different currencies.
  • New customers:
    During registration the customer can choose a currency. Each site shall offer a list of currencies the customer can pick one. At the moment, only the ExportShop will have more than one currency in this list. However, this is a flexible solution.
    Currency selection in registration shall only be visible, if there are multiple options. It makes no sense to display a currency dropdown with only one mandatory item.

Additional info:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/E110+Multiple+Currencies

comments.comment: Done! See Sub-tasks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3188] Use xsd:extension to define CodeListUnit in wsdl file
item.description:
At the moment the xsd:complexTypes CodeList and CodeListUnit are defined independently in the wsdl file. Could you please change the definition of CodeListUnit to inherit the elements code, description and lastModifiedErp from CodeList:
-----------------------
<xsd:complexType name="CodeListUnit">
<xsd:complexContent>
<xsd:extension base="CodeList">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:integer" />
<xsd:element name="unit" type="xsd:string" />
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:extension>
</xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>
-----------------------
Rationale: We generate Java classes from these definitions and would like to have CodeListUnit to extend CodeList.
item.summary: Use xsd:extension to define CodeListUnit in wsdl file

comments.comment: Inheritance introduced.

Hi Maciej,

thank you for introducing the inheritance. As the call does not work at the moment (see https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3187 ), I could not test this yet.

Best,
Klaus
testing of xsd:extension must wait for error reported in DISTRELEC-3187 to be fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1517] Pickup locations are Country specific
item.description:
Pickup location must be defined by country. (Currently they are defined by SalesOrg.)

Tasks to be done:

  • change data model and documentation
  • change logic to determine availability
  • change logic to determine pickup locations during checkout
  • update impex import of pickup locations
  • update unit test

Estimated effort:

  • 1md

comments.comment:
Hi Cuno,

can you please take care of this change.

I assigned you the following projectile task: "Pickup locations are Country specific".
Out of Scope for Release 1 according to Oana
Here we go.
Nando, please check if required for IT/CH and if not move to ELFA
Verified, not a problem for IT/CH release. Scheduling it for ELFA.
Done! As discussed, I replaced the relation between warehouse and salesOrg (just pickupWarehouses) with a relation to the cmsSite so that you can define pickupwarehouses for each country and brand.
Keep an eye on the pickup definition during launch of v2.0 since the underlaying data model has changed. Test whether CH still has Nänikon as pickup location.
